item.title: Why Are Bluetooth Speakers Losing Their Built-In Microphones?
item.description: Bluetooth speakers are increasingly losing built-in microphones, reducing their versatility for online meetings. Possible motivations for this change include cost-cutting and focusing on core features, which creates challenges for mobile users unable to separate mic and audio functions.
